name: Preschool
description: The school offers children ages 2.5 - 5 years. As a cooperative nursery school, parent participation helps create a family atmosphere that reflects the San Francisco community. Parents are required to help once per week and attended monthly meetings. Vist the Family Responsibilities page for further information.

Parents are required to help once per week and attended monthly meetings. Vist the Family Responsibilities page for further information.

howToGetIt: Visit the Join Us page on their website for application requirements. You can apply online also.
cost: This is a fee based service.
